data.text: Davide ná-maawɔin wuyei, é tooni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ, é ʋilɛ Kuse ʋa, Ɓɛnzamɛn nui.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, nà-GALAGI, nà lɔɔɠuzu ɠaiziɛzu è ʋɔ bɛ,
nii a kɛ ti mina bàli ga eɠɛ zalai,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ná-GALAGI, ni gè naa ɠɛɛʋɛ,
ni gè ɓaaɠogɛ bɔ̀ɔlai ta ma,
naazu sìli nui ʋilɛ pòlu, é sò,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ɗɛi è ga ziiti pɛ tukpɔɠaaleʋe nui,
Pele ɓesa faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-vaa ɲɔi luɠɔ,
GALA ka é ga nà-kɔɔɠɔ zɛpɛgi.
GALA ka ga tukpɔɠaaleʋe nui nii sɔlegai,
nui naa laalɔɠɔma, nii é la ʋaazu pɔ.
Toɠa kɔɔɠɔ zɔɔlaiti kpɛtɛzu nu ʋaa vai ma,
Wɛlɛ, faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠa telebotalai ɠɛʋele ɓɛtɛzu,
Ná-faa ɲɔi ɠa loozu tɔ ɓɔɠɔi unma.
Nà Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ ná-telebodai maaʋele ma,
